name: Kohei Hattori
content:
Kohei is a IFA United Nations international ambassador singer (Commanded by United Nations) who performs at Anime conventions, Japanese festivals and Asian festivals in the US.

He recorded the song for Aniplex Japan in 2021 May for the anime called "Tokyo 24th Ward". Kohei also recorded songs for BMG Music in April 2023.

Other notable performances and appearances:

  • Official MC at Japan Fes in NYC 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023
  • Official MC at Houston Japan Festival 2018, 2019, and 2023
  • Kohei has performed at various Anime Conventions in the US such as Anime Expo LA (2018 & 2019), San Japan Texas, Anime California (2018 & 2019), AniMinneapolis (2018, 2022, & 2023), Liberty City Anime Con, Delta H Con (2018, 2019, 2021, & 2022), AniManga Expo (2018, 2019, & 2021), SaikoCon, AnimeNext, AnimeWTC (2019 & 2020), IchibanCon, Anime Iowa, Castle Point Anime Convention, JAFAX, MechaCon, ColossalCon East, SwampCon, Anime Oasis (2019 & 2022), Anime Magic (2019, 2021, 2022, & 2023), New York Comic Con After Party, Anime NYC After Party, Anime Lubbock 2021, Ecchi Expo 2021, OKiCon 2021, Anime Dallas 2021, Oz-Con (2022 & 2023), Animarathon 2022, Anime Houston 2022, SetsuCon (2020 & 2023), Kitsune Kon, SabotenCon (2021 & 2023), Anime Midwest (2022 & 2023), and more!
